    • Method Detail

      • addRequestField

        default <V> HttpConnection<T> addRequestField(HttpConnection.RequestField field,
                                              V value)
        Add header to http request
        Parameters:
        field - Field that will be added in the headers of the request
        value - Value of the field, this will be serialized to string
        See Also:
        List of header fields and usage

      • addRequestFields

        default HttpConnection<T> addRequestFields(HeaderMap map)
        Add headers to http request
        Parameters:
        map - Map containing all fields and values, the values will be serialized to string
